insert into t_competition (title, description, data_desc, is_include_media, data_url, program_url, `type`, publish_time, update_time, join_num, `status`, logo_url, end_time, type_id, bonus, score_items, key_data_map, content ) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isIncludeMedia,jdbcType=BIT}, #{dataUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{joinNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bonus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scoreItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyDataMap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
